content:
Congratulations on starting your cardio routine! That's a great step towards a healthier lifestyle. Now, let's fuel your body with some high-protein lunch ideas to support your muscle growth and repair. Here are some delicious and nutritious options:

1. **Grilled Chicken Breast with Quinoa and Veggies**: Marinate chicken breast in your favorite seasonings and grill it. Serve with quinoa, roasted veggies like broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers.
2. **Turkey and Avocado Wrap**: Spread hummus on a whole-grain wrap, layer with sliced turkey breast, avocado, lettuce, tomato, and mustard. Roll it up and slice in half.
3. **Lentil Soup with Turkey Meatballs**: Cook lentils with diced veggies and spices. Add turkey meatballs made with lean ground turkey, oats, and egg. Season with salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs.
4. **Salmon Fillet with Brown Rice and Steamed Asparagus**: Grill or bake salmon fillet with lemon and herbs. Serve with brown rice and steamed asparagus for a well-rounded meal.
5. **Greek Yogurt Parfait with Nuts and Berries**: Layer Greek yogurt, chopped nuts (almonds or walnuts), and mixed berries (blueberries, strawberries, raspberries) in a bowl. Add a sprinkle of granola for crunch.
6. **Chicken and Black Bean Salad**: Mix cooked chicken breast, black beans, diced tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion. Drizzle with a citrus vinaigrette dressing.
7. **Protein-Packed Smoothie**: Blend Greek yogurt, banana, spinach, protein powder (if you use it), and almond milk. Add nuts or seeds like chia, flax, or hemp for extra protein and fiber.
8. **Turkey and Cheese Sandwich on Whole-Grain Bread**: Layer sliced turkey breast, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and mustard on whole-grain bread. Look for bread with at least 3g of protein per slice.
9. **Shrimp and Veggie Stir-Fry**: Cook shrimp with your favorite veggies (bell peppers, onions, broccoli) and brown rice. Season with soy sauce and a squeeze of fresh lime juice.
10. **Chickpea and Spinach Salad**: Mix cooked chickpeas, fresh spinach, diced cucumber, and cherry tomatoes. Add a vinaigrette dressing and a sprinkle of feta cheese (optional).

Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day. Aim to include a source of protein, complex carbohydrates, and healthy fats in each meal to support your muscle growth and repair.

Good luck with your cardio routine, and enjoy your lunch!
